auditCategories.name: Code Quality
auditCategories.description: TypeScript code quality, linting, and maintainability assessment

criteria.name: TypeScript Strict Mode Compilation
criteria.description: All TypeScript files compile without errors in strict mode

criteria.name: ESLint Code Quality
criteria.description: All source files pass ESLint without warnings or errors

criteria.name: Unit Test Coverage
criteria.description: Unit test coverage meets minimum 80% threshold

criteria.name: Code Complexity Analysis
criteria.description: Cyclomatic complexity within acceptable ranges

criteria.name: Type Safety Compliance
criteria.description: No use of 'any' type except where explicitly necessary

auditCategories.name: Documentation
auditCategories.description: Documentation completeness, accuracy, and currency validation

criteria.name: README Completeness
criteria.description: README.md contains all essential sections for template usage

criteria.name: Documentation Accuracy
criteria.description: Documentation content matches actual implementation

criteria.name: Link Validation
criteria.description: All documentation links are valid and accessible

criteria.name: API Documentation Coverage
criteria.description: Public APIs are properly documented with TSDoc comments

criteria.name: Setup Instructions Clarity
criteria.description: Clear and complete setup instructions for new developers

auditCategories.name: Security
auditCategories.description: Security vulnerability assessment and best practices validation

criteria.name: Dependency Security Audit
criteria.description: No high or critical security vulnerabilities in dependencies

criteria.name: Security Configuration
criteria.description: Proper security headers and configuration in place

criteria.name: Sensitive Data Exposure
criteria.description: No hardcoded secrets or sensitive data in source code

criteria.name: File Permissions
criteria.description: Appropriate file permissions for security

criteria.name: 60 FPS Performance Target
criteria.description: Game maintains stable 60 FPS under standard test conditions

criteria.name: Bundle Size Optimization
criteria.description: Production bundle size within acceptable limits (<5MB)

criteria.name: Initial Load Time
criteria.description: Game loads within 2 seconds on standard hardware

criteria.name: Memory Usage Efficiency
criteria.description: Memory usage remains within acceptable bounds during gameplay

criteria.name: Asset Optimization
criteria.description: Assets are properly optimized and compressed

auditCategories.name: Template Cleanup
auditCategories.description: Development artifacts removal and template optimization

criteria.name: Unused Dependencies
criteria.description: No unused dependencies in package.json

criteria.name: Backup File Cleanup
criteria.description: No backup files (.bak, .tmp, etc.) in template

criteria.name: Dead Code Elimination
criteria.description: Less than 2% dead code remaining in source files

criteria.name: Configuration Cleanup
criteria.description: No unused configuration files or settings

criteria.name: Template Placeholder Removal
criteria.description: All template placeholders and scaffolding removed

criteria.name: Temporary File Cleanup
criteria.description: No temporary files (.DS_Store, Thumbs.db, etc.)
